_header: Hail boot of bale blessed Queen
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Orison to the Virgin Mary — 320 lines in couplets

BLAdd39574.First Lines:
Hayle bote of bale blissed qweneTo sight so semely is noon
                    sene…
BLAdd39574.Last Lines:
…and forgyf hem þat haues done mysAnd bryng vs alle to
                    þi sone blys. Amen
BLAdd39574.Editions:
Day,  Mabel,
                        ed.  
             The Wheatley Manuscript: Middle English Verse and Prose in British
                Museum MS. Additional 39574.
